name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: if [ -f packages.txt ]; then sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y; sudo xargs apt install -y < packages.txt; fi; python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel --user; if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; else pip3 install --user streamlit; fi; pip3 install --user --upgrade pandas>=2.2.3; echo 'âœ… Packages installed and requirements met successfully.'
